pu.loopScheduler

Class GuidedLoopScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • pu.loopScheduler.AbstractLoopScheduler
      • pu.loopScheduler.DynamicLoopScheduler
        • pu.loopScheduler.GuidedLoopScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoopScheduler

    public class GuidedLoopScheduler
extends DynamicLoopScheduler
    This class partitions loop iterations using a similar approach to the DynamicLoopScheduler; however the chunk size shrinks as portions of the loop iterations are assigned to the threads. That is, at a specific time the chunk size assigned to a thread is: remaining-iterations/number-of-threads.

    NOTE: Users can specify minimum chunk size (passed as the chunk-size argument to LoopSchedulerFactory), to ensure that chunk sizes will not be smaller than the minimum chunk size.
    Since:
    2016
    Author:
    Mostafa Mehrabi
